original_text: For this is the will of God, that by doing good you should put to silence the ignorance of foolish people.
korean_text: 곧 선행으로 어리석은 사람들의 무식한 말을 막으시는 것이라

sentences.original_text: For this is the will of God,
you should put to silence the ignorance of foolish people.
sentences.korean_translation: 어리석은 사람들의 무지를 잠잠하게 하려 하심이라.
